title: 4/2 Candler Park Apartment
posting_body: ['Four bedroom, two bath apartment.', ' Candler Park.', ' $2400.', ' September 1.', 'This apartment is the main level of a Candler Park home.', ' It has four regular sized bedrooms with closets, two full bathrooms, a full kitchen, separate living and dining rooms, a covered front porch, and a screened-in back deck.', ' Central heat and air.', ' Shared laundry in the basement.', ' Street parking.', 'Great location in Candler Park, immediately backing up to a community park.', ' Walking distance to local shops, restaurants, and bars.', ' Convenient to bike paths on Hosea and Clifton.', ' One mile to MARTA rail and bus lines.', ' Zoned for Mary Lin, Inman, Midtown schools.', '$2400 with the tenant paying all utilities.', ' $2000 refundable deposit.', ' Twelve month lease.', ' Standard background and credit check.', ' Small animals permitted with deposit.', ' Please no smoking.']
